chapters.summaryKo: 핍박 중에도 자라는 믿음을 칭찬하고 심판 때의 보응을 말합니다.
chapters.summaryEn: Commends growing faith amid persecution and speaks of coming judgment.
chapters.messageKo: 너희의 믿음이 더욱 자라고 서로 사랑함이 풍성하니.
chapters.messageEn: Your faith is growing more and more, and the love all of you have for one another is increasing.

keyEvents.eventEn: Counted worthy of kingdom of God
When Lord Jesus is revealed from heaven

chapters.summaryKo: 주의 날이 오기 전에 불법의 사람이 나타남을 가르칩니다.
chapters.summaryEn: Teaches that man of lawlessness must appear before Lord's day.
chapters.messageKo: 먼저 배교하는 일이 있고 저 불법의 사람 곧 멸망의 아들이 나타나리라.
chapters.messageEn: That day will not come until the rebellion occurs and the man of lawlessness is revealed.

keyEvents.eventEn: Man of lawlessness sets up in temple
Lord will overthrow with breath of his mouth

chapters.summaryKo: 기도를 부탁하고 게으른 자를 경계하며 부지런히 일하라 권면합니다.
chapters.summaryEn: Requests prayer, warns against idleness, urges diligent work.
chapters.messageEn: The one who is unwilling to work shall not eat.

keyEvents.eventEn: Pray that word of Lord may spread
Unwilling to work shall not eat
